title: Topic 001 Question 026
body: You have a Teams Phone deployment that contains an Operator Connect provider in Canada.
You implement a common area phone named lobbyphone1.
You need to configure lobbyphone1 to meet the following requirements:
•	Outgoing calls must be placed only from within Canada.
•	Dial out during audio conferencing must be restricted.
How should you complete the command? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
